sentences.english: Nami technology is one of the top technologies in this century.
sentences.chinese: 纳米技术是本世纪最重要的高新技术之一。

sentences.english: But critics point out that there are risks inherent in nanotechnology.
sentences.chinese: 但是，有批评家指出纳米技术存在固有风险。

sentences.english: This article discusses the development of nanometer intellectualized thermoregulation wool fabric.
sentences.chinese: 采用微胶囊纳米技术开发智能调温毛织物。

sentences.english: The research was published in the journal Nanotechnology. [Roberto Guzmán de Villoria et al.
sentences.chinese: 该研究已发表在《纳米技术》杂志。

sentences.english: This article is part of a spotlight on Nanotechnology for health.
sentences.chinese: 该文章是卫生领域的纳米技术专题聚焦的一部分。

sentences.english: If you think nano technology is all in the future, think again.
sentences.chinese: 如果你认为纳米技术都是未来的事情，那就再想想。

sentences.english: One new way to sneak meds past the barrier might be nanotechnology.
sentences.chinese: 把药物送入大脑的一个新的方法可能会是纳米技术。

sentences.english: Merkle told me, I don't want nanotechnology to evolve.
sentences.chinese: 默克尔告诉我，我不希望纳米技术进化。

sentences.english: The nanomechanics rose from the need of nano-technology.
sentences.chinese: 近年它随著纳米技术的需要而兴起并发展。

sentences.english: Contact the toxicologist in Los Angeles Californiawho specializes in nanotechnology.
sentences.chinese: 联系加州洛杉矶专门研究纳米技术的毒理学家。
跃进到更绿色的纳米技术？

sentences.english: AMD has had lots of time to work out the kinks with 40nm technology.
sentences.chinese: AMD已经有大量的时间下，与40纳米技术的缺陷。

sentences.english: Nanotechnology is the science of materials at the molecular or subatomic level.
sentences.chinese: 纳米技术是关于分子或亚原子层次上的材料科学。

sentences.english: Many scientists consider nano-technology to be the science of the future.
sentences.chinese: 许多科学家认为纳米技术是未来科学研究的主流。

sentences.english: Dr Anil K Roy, owner of Nanotech.
sentences.chinese: 医生阿尼尔k罗伊，纳米技术的拥有者。

sentences.english: Several disadvantageous effects of nanotechnologies also exist.
sentences.chinese: 纳米技术也同样存在一些负作用。
